; } class index extends Component { state = { product: {}, sohinhanh: 0, active: 0 }; renderTab(n){ switch (n){ case 0: return Mô tả; case 1: return Thông số kỹ thuật; case 2: return Đánh giá; } } renderItem(n){ switch (n){ case 0: return ; case 1: return ; case 2: return ; } } componentDidMount() { var { loai } = this.props.match.params; var { hang } = this.props.match.params; var { dong } = this.props.match.params; var { sanpham } = this.props.match.params; var query = `/${loai}/${hang}/${dong}/${sanpham}`; mobileApi .mobileInfo(query) .then((success) => { if (success.status == 200) { this.setState({ product: success.data.value.$values[0], sohinhanh: success.data.serializerSettings.sohinhanh - 1, }); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log("error" + error); }); } addToCart = () => { let email = localStorage.getItem("email"); let password = localStorage.getItem("password"); let { product } = this.state; let { cartActionCreators } = this.props; cartActionCreators.addToCartReport( { email: email, password: password, product: product, }, this.props.history ); }; render() { return (
